description: John Mierzwa started bootcamp for coders. Knew of need before coming to ABQ. Good cause but immense issues with scaling and tracking impact.
quote: This is really going to help give a much clearer picture of all the data in all our various systems so that we can be more efficient in trying to address some of these properties.
quote-attribution: Tom Modica, Assistant City Manager, Long Beach, California

metrics.description: of addresses in Long Beach accounted for 52% of emergency medical calls in 2013
Interviews conducted by the Long Beach team in February
City staff trained to use AddressIQ

links.description: Code for America develops app to help Long Beach reduce 911 medical calls
